TextView.android:text: This Android app is developed with an intention for career guidance for 10 th and intermediate students.It specifies information about all the opportunities for 10 th and Inter passed out students can avail.This app provides footsteps for a better career life . Based on the prefernces of favourite subjects and type of profession , a students desires , he / she can look into the various career options of his/her interest.This app also provides detailed description of each career choice and as well about the competitive exams related to that particular career option.This app is like a handbook for recently passed out 10 th and Inter students. This app is developed with an intention to help the young minds for making effective long term career decision.
